item.description:
Hi All,
with Learn to Fly day coming up, let's get together to go over ideas.
Seems we need a good group to work on this.

Some of the ideas have been:

Should we ask Fred about using the area in front of Andy's hangar and buildings 13 and 14?
Should we have a ground school? Who will run it?
Should we get static displays? Who's? From where? LSA's?
FPA Table?
FCA Table?
Rides?
Who to invite?
Advertise? Where?
Other ideas?

Please RSVP so we know who's coming. Probably have it at Bullocks again.

Last time we had a good meeting about OSH like this and got everything pretty much accomplished in one meeting.

All are invited and the input would be helpful. This is your airport and organization. Let's make this event a hit?

Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: FPA- AOPA- EAA LTF day meeting...
